result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jaron M Bridges

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jaron M Bridges in court.  Attorney Michael J Steinle in court for Jaron M Bridges.  Attorney Francesco Mineo in court on behalf of Michael R Staskunas for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in Court for a plea and sentencing hearing.  Defense requested adjournment of proceedings. Court grants request.  Case remains calendared in Branch 11.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Jade K Hall in court.  Defendant's appearance waived.  Alexander James Geocaris for Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for scheduling conference.  Attorney Steinle privately retained by defendant.  Attorney Jade K. Hall was accidently appointed as counsel and requested to be withdrawn.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court.  Case remains calendared for plea/sentencing September 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jaron M Bridges in court with attorney Michael J. Steinle.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requested plea/sentencing date.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 11.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk

Defendant Jaron M Bridges in court, appear in person with attorney Michael J Steinle, appear in person.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned toReseved Judge John Franke. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Reseved Judge John Franke.   Per Chief Judge Directive 22-04 effective July 30, 2022, this calendar will be assigned to Judge David Swanson, Branch 11 in Room 316 of the Safety Bldg.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 057554,
Payable Number: 1014871,
Receipt Number: 22RP025153,
Amount: $20.00
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jaron M Bridges in court with attorney Angel L Johnson.  Defendant Jaron M Bridges in custody at MSDF.  Constatine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jaron M Bridges appeared by video means with Attorney.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Franke, Br. 25. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL. This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Jaron M Bridges not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 5/23/2022. Defendant is in custody at MSDF. Needs to be produced for court.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/23/2022@2:00p
